system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.iHruvh0FiUFh3EDH]{Distance Rifle Specialist}

Benefits

When attacking with a bolt action rifle, anti-materiel rifle, or designated marksman rifle, a character may ignore half of the targetâ€™s DEF bonuses due to movement.

Special

All other defense bonuses due to armor, Agility, and size still apply unless otherwise noted.
system.summary: Ignore 1/2 target's movement bonus to defense
